website_summaries.verdict: With Delson - Camben’s  easy to slip-on sporty look and excellent ventilation, this is a perfect choice for the laid back summer getaways. This kick deserves a space in anyone's closet for its superb comfort, stylish look, and lightness found at a very affordable price point. Despite few expressed criticism on the pair’s unoriginal look and unreliable durability, the majority still recommended this for practical buyers who prioritize comfort over the label.
pros: Most of the reviewers like the superb comfort of the Delson - Camben from Skechers
Most users love the stylish look of this model
This shoe has excellent ventilation, many reviewers have shared
Many reviewers say that this sneaker is perfect for traveling, casual strolling, and even for the light workout
Few buyers disclose that they highly recommended this pair to their friends
Many have cited about the easy on and off feature of this model
A couple of reviewers have praised the flexible outsole that delivers superb grip
The Skechers Delson - Camben is available at an affordable price point
This sneaker runs true to size for a few buyers
cons: Few reviewers have criticized that the Skechers Delson - Camben wears out quickly
One shares that this is a cheap knock-off of other renowned brands

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised by how terribly uncomfortable these shoes were. The "comfort sole" on the inside is somewhat soft, however, it doesn't fill the whole inside. There is a 1/4" gap around the edge with no padding. As a result, it always feels like you are stepping on something. The arch support is similar in that is more just uncomfortable rather than supporting. This is not normal for Sketchers, as I usually like their shoes. The outside looked fine, but I am not one to wear a terribly uncomfortable shoe just for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I always buy Skechers 9 1/2 Wides, so that ...
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Skechers 9 1/2 Wides, so that is what I ordered in this model shoe, and they are way too tight on the toes. Very uncomfortable and tight around the sides, when it is supposed to be wide. So I ordered a size 10 Wide, just to see if it made a difference, but turns out they are also way too tight and crush the toes from the sides. They must have changed how they make their shoes, because their Wides are REALLY narrow.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bardi

customer_reviews.title: and should be comfortable and cool to wear
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are lightweight, well constructed, and should be comfortable and cool to wear. I returned them because the laces are small diameter shock-cord and not adjustable. I would have to carry a shoe horn to get them on and that would be sort of inconvenient. I have arthritic hands which makes putting on shoes difficult, otherwise these shoes would serve well. I ordered size 10 and the shoes were a comfortable 10.
customer_reviews.author: gerimedic

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper than Ko%$#s and they are the most comfortable shoes I have had in years very light
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than Ko%$#s and they are the most comfortable shoes I have had in years very light , but how long they last.... we shall see. seem to be very good quality.. update : got 3 pairs cause they are so comfortable and it's hard to find shoes that fit me just right.. these do! 3 colors to cover the whole wardrobe..
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I ordered these shoes because I saw them in a store and liked the looks. I found them to be significantly cheaper on Amazon than they were at the store, so I bought them. They are a really nice looking shoe, but also surprisingly comfortable. They are light weight, yet don't feel cheap. Even my son was impressed by the look of the shoe, and you know how young folk are about their shoes!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, I ordered what I normally wear, 10.5 Very comfortable, also ordered the tan color.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Byfield

customer_reviews.title: I was swimming in size 9.5, returned for size 9
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 9.5 since this is what I usually wear in other brands. Had to return them for size 9s because the 9.5s nearly felt like they were falling off my feet as I walked. These are loose shoes especially since you can not tighten or tie the laces. The laces are stretchy and not removable or adjustable (unless you wanted to cut them). I’m surprised that other reviews called these shoes too tight or too narrow. They are roomy. Don’t buy these if you were looking for shoes that could be tightened. I wish the seller made it more clear that these shoes cannot be tied/tightened.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The color of the photo doesn't match the real color, the true color is light brown, not yellowish as photo shows. Size is true fit. Very light. Does not have shoe laces. It's elastic and the ends permanently attached, but you can pull the elastic it slides through the loops.
customer_reviews.author: LOVE ALL

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I wear a size 14 and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I wear a size 14 and the shoes are wide fit which is great. Would recommend. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Z

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the fit.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what quite to say with this shoe. I ordered the Taupe and the Black/Grey. I tried on the Taupe and it was perfect. I’m a 12D. Every shoe any brand. Fit great. Comfortable, lightweight perfect. But then I tried the Grey/black. I couldn’t get it on my foot. Not even close. It was closer to a size 10 than a 12. It tells me that Skechers has a problem with quality control. How can the same shoe of the same size be so far off in sizing? I love the shoe in the Taupe. It’s Great but the other color is extremely far off in sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One day after the return window closed, the sole of the shoe separated leaving me with a floppy sole. I'm incredibly disappointed. They were an attractive shoe, fit well, but fell apart after wearing them about a dozen times at work (I have a desk job). Wish I could give zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are made for walking baby, Christopher Walken.
customer_reviews.text: Best sneaker I have ever owned. No one can tell they are slip ons! Inside material is super soft. It has a tight fit but who doesn't like a tight fit? Am I right? Pero seriously love this shoe. Everyone that sees me wearing them asks where I got them and what brand.
customer_reviews.author: Magnar Foxx

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: "Oh yeah!" This was the comment my husband made after trying on these shoes. "They are perfect" - - his words. They are lightweight (especially for a size 13 wide!) yet supportive and the soles are very cushioned and comfortable. He was worn them on day trips where we have walked - A LOT - and his feet never hurt. These shoes are his go to shoes now. And thank goodness - - no more sneakers! Hubby is a very happy camper and stylish, too, I might add!
customer_reviews.author: VickiTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great design!  Ultra light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Awesome design, super lightweight and comfortable. I’m a technician and I needed something for work that I can easily be on my feet on concrete and metal floors for long periods of time and still look presentable. Fit was exact, not loose or tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kacz

customer_reviews.title: slip on
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slip on shoe. I rate this about a 4.5 only because it is not a perfect fit although a good one and I find it runs a bit warm. I think the extra warmth is due to the foam padding which also makes it good. So i expect it to be a better cool weather shoe rather than a summer one.
customer_reviews.author: AnotherSmith

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves these shoes
customer_reviews.text: For years my husbands favorite shoes were an Asics athletic shoe in white. I was tired of him wearing them with EVERYTHING, so I got him these. Normally, because he has a high instep and wide feet, he has to size up for a comfortable fit. But he says these shoes are really comfortable. The slip-on aspect is a plus. When you are 65+, bending over to tie you shoes becomes (literally) a pain. So now he wears THESE shoes all of the time. He is just not interested in the simple fashion statement, light colored pants, light colored shoes, dark colored pants, dark shoes....
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Shoes Cost Money
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfy, look ok, breathable, and are really easy to put on. They are basically slip on sneakers. The tread on the bottom of mine has almost completely balded in about 4-5 months of daily use. Even when there was tread, walking on a wet surface was dangerous, without tread its almost a guaranteed fall. The fabric on the back of the shoe is starting to come apart. For its price I think it did ok. They are now being retired to around the house shoes.
customer_reviews.author: TheCowKing

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I had been shopping online for shoes for my husband and thought he would probably like these. Then I saw a man wearing them at a restaurant. After confirming that they were the same ones, I asked if he like them. He said yes, and his wife chimed in, "He sure does. He wears them every day!" My husband was excited to see that they come in wide width, so we ordered them. He's been wearing them every day for a couple of weeks now, and so far so good. I wish more colors were available in wide width. Skechers, thanks for updating the look of your very comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.author: She loves a deal

customer_reviews.title: Caused severe foot and ankle pain
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 pairs of Skechers shoes. They are attractive and well-made. When I first put them on they seemed like the most comfortable shoes I'd ever worn, but as summer came and I wore them daily, I started having severe foot and ankle pain. At first I didn't associate the pain with the shoes, but when I checked online reviews, I was surprised at how many other purchasers reported similar symptoms. I also saw warnings from podiatrists. I stopped wearing the Skechers and after 2 weeks, my foot and ankle symptoms were gone. I will not buy Skechers shoes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: James Taborn

customer_reviews.title: Left bigger than the right!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible shoes my wife swears by Skechers at swear AT them, Left shoe was bigger than the right, no support what so ever I wore them for less than 2 city blocks and my knees started to hurt my feet felt like I was walking memory stone !! There memory foam may as well be 1 piece of single ply !!! Like I said no support and NO shock absorption, no cushion for your feet what so ever!!!!! Better off barefoot STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A gift for the husband
customer_reviews.text: I dragged the husband to DSW to shop for a pair of comfortable flats for myself but he ended up finding these for himself. He never wants anything so is hard to buy gifts for birthdays, etc and he wandered over holding these and made the comment 'If you need to get me something for my birthday, I like these. They feel like slippers.' Sold people. Hoped onto Amazon to see if the price was better, of course it was and for once I was ahead of schedule with a gift for him! He loves them and wears them all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best shoes I have. They are very comfortable and look great. These are the 2nd pair of Skechers shoes I have purchased and both fit and feel great. I am not sure how long they will last, but, at this price who cares.
customer_reviews.author: Lockman

customer_reviews.title: Like Wearing Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Super-comfortable shoes that work from dressed down to dressed up. Much more versatile than athletic-looking sneakers. It's possible the width runs narrow. My feet are C, with one almost a B, and these slip-ons stay on my feet. The never-tie elastic laces keep them snug; I don't walk out of them. With minimal support, they might not be great walking shoes. Especially not for me, since I'm flat-footed. Still, I wore them throughout a 2-hour museum visit and 1-mile walk to subway after that and felt fine. I like these so much, I've bought them in two colors -- taupe and grey/black.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Buys Stuff

customer_reviews.title: 17 Year Old Son Loves These
customer_reviews.text: My son has wore this exact brand and model for the last 3-4 years. We previously would buy them once a year at Meijer's (brick and mortar store) when they had them for $65 (buy one pair, get one free). So I was thrilled to find them on Amazon and see if what we ordered was true to the same shoe we bought at Meijer's. They were! And at $35 a pair, it comes out to same great price. Very good shoes, only con is the bottom sole wears out a bit quick for active teens. I wish they made them with more of a real rubber sole (tire tread). -Mom Review
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is lightweight and fits ok - a little tight getting the foot in but after the memory foam flattens out it fits ok. I would give this more stars but giving that I always buy Skechers shoes for years and year, the company has changed to one style of shoe now - this memory foam wide fit thing. I miss the unique cool styles they offered before.
customer_reviews.author: Nickmbb

customer_reviews.title: Best casual shoes I've purchased in a very long time.
customer_reviews.text: They are super light weight. Which is nice cause it feels like nothing is on your feet. It has this little air ridges inside the shoe around certain spots and I thought it would bother my foot but it makes your foot stay cool and the mesh helps. Love the look of them and for the price I'm ordering 2 more colors. They are great buy for someone who wants a quick slip shoe for the house or running to the store. I can't imagine the foam soles would withstand long concrete walks or running. Overall one of the best pair of shoes I've bought in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: d.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Never tried more uncomfortable shoe in my life
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are well made and look good. However I developed serious left leg pain minutes after wearing them. I never have shoe problem. I find almost all shoes comfortable and never had shoe issue. Not believing the shoe being cause of serious spasm, I tried them on two additional occasions. Each time, within minutes of wearing them, my left leg would start paining. I was able to wear my old shoes immediately after without any pain. While I can’t explain what in the shoe is causing it, it is time to return and try a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mash

customer_reviews.title: Amazing look, but whole size too big
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe. Slip on. They are a whole size larger than my normal size...at least for me...i wear 10.5 90% of the time..these were roomy in the toe are and wide as well and i bought 10s, then returned them and got 9.5s. ALSO a tad unformfortable on the heel...but nice and snug with 9.5....maybe 10s would have been better...not sure...9.5 is a good snug. After owning it a few weeks, I lowered my review to 4 stars. Yes it is light and looks awesome. But the material feels cheap because of it. Really thin and some spots are unfortable...like around the heel area.
customer_reviews.author: The Saeko

customer_reviews.title: One of the best shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize they dont have shoe strings at first, but these are such a snug fit you don't need them! They fit very well and I couldn't believe how snug they were- it's not a feeling that your foot is being squeezed to explode, just a nice comforting hold. The souls of the shoe are or seem to be made or soft pokeable rubber foam type feel, but it's grippy so being my first pair of sketchers ever I'm looking to see how these last.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair. I really like them. Read on to see why I don't absolutely love them...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. I wear one for every day and the other for special occasions. I wear a size 8.5, however, for the first pair, I ordered a size 9. Good thing I did, because those shoes were quite tight; but, within a month, the shoes had stretched to where they fit great. When I received my second pair (also a size 9), they, too, were rather tight. I'm wearing them regularly so that they will stretch out and fit nice.
customer_reviews.author: TDSutter

customer_reviews.title: Fit is everything.
customer_reviews.text: Style is exceptional, so is the workmanship. I always struggled to find the perfect fit in shoes. Either too large or too small. Maybe it's the slight differences between my feet. I normally wear a size10.5W, but in this style, I needed a size 10W instead. It did take me a couple of tris to get the closest fit. I like the comfort, color coordination, and materials used in constructing the shoes, which has expanded my wardrobe. I am very pleased with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have real laces - tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it was very clear from the photos (since all shoes don't show laces being tied - it's a style thing for photos) but these don't have "real" laces. They are rubber-like laces that are supposed to stretch to let you slide your foot in and then tighten back down. I wear the same size in every brand of shoe (except Merrell) and found these to be unusually tight. They look nice but I could not get my foot in them, even with the stretch of the fake laces. Returning them to get a regular shoe with normal laces.
customer_reviews.author: Soldier1986

customer_reviews.title: Meets husband’s standards
customer_reviews.text: Husband is on his feet at work during the day and has been trying to find a pair of shoes to fit his needs. These are a great price, which, I’ll be honest, made me question the quality, but they had great reviews so I thought he’d just give them a try. After the first day, he said they were awesome; they passed the test. They are light and comfortable on his feet, and don’t make his feet hot. We ended up buying another color, too. After a few weeks of wearing them, they’re still meeting his standards and he really likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked them so much I bought 3 pair in different colors
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. Great for traveling or any activity where you are on your feet all day. Considering they don't have actual laces, they stay comfortably snug on your feet, and don't slip. I don't know that I would go running in them, but any other activity or day to day activities and these can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur D. Castelli Jr.

customer_reviews.title: A solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: Having no-laces as an interesting choice but it works well with the shoe, I liked it. The very back of the shoe (right behind the heel) is straight and tough, kind of digs into your heel a bit and makes the shoe a bit of a tighter because of it. If the back wasn't so stiff, It would have fit a lot better and not as tight as it did. Once you stretch it out a bit though, It isn't as bad but the first few days you wear these shoes, It'll suck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are bulky and wide
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit terrible. I used to love skechers but not anymore. Their size 11.5 fit like a 13, as did the size 11 and very wide. I then tried the size 10 and they were too small in the toe but still bulk in side. These are not summer shoes. they are heavy and I will only wear them in the winter. I had to buy a heel insert. I would go and try these on in store before buying online
customer_reviews.author: Don Reese

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second pair. Perhaps a bit overpriced considering their durability. I wear mine a lot and they began showing signs of use, wear and tear rather quickly. I now have a hierarchy of Sketchers from "Athleisure Formal" to garden kickers, they work their way down the line. Insoles shredded quickly and have been replaced in all. I wear these all day without foot fatigue or discomfort and recommend them for what they are; relatively affordable, extremely comfortable casual footwear with a bazillion different styles!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Potter

customer_reviews.title: I really don't know what's up with Skechers.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I have a pair of skechers wide fit sneakers that are very comfortable, but I wanted something a little nicer to wear with my work clothes. These looked to be made from the same materials and came in wide width so I ordered them. They're not really wide width at all as far as I can tell. They're OK, but I'll have to wear them a bit to stretch them out. When I hold them up sole to sole with my wide fit sneakers there is a big difference. The arch is a little off too. Perhaps they were seconds.
customer_reviews.author: E. Prickley

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Comfortable Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a pair of sneakers for everyday wear that looks fashionable, the Skechers Delson-Camden is worth considering. They have a roomy toe-box, plenty of cushioning, and are light-weight. They also come in a variety of appealing colors. The only downsides are that they aren't very breathable, and the laces don't tighten, which makes it impossible to tighten them sufficiently for more athletic endeavors. Size-wise, they run a little on the short side; I'm a true 11.5, and the size 12 is barely long enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Ugly sewing on sole
customer_reviews.text: Well, after 4 months of use, my husband says that those are one of the most comfortable tennis shoes he has ever worn. He love how the look like, how easy is putting them on and how can he walk without getting tired. There is only one thing we didn’t like and is the sewing on the sole, looks a bit tacky on a por of shoes that nice, other than that, so recommended, they have the 3 of the basic colors so they match with almost everything
customer_reviews.author: saraquinte

customer_reviews.title: This one fits tighter than my other pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grey version a year ago and loved them. Great for our vacation that included a lot of walking. So for this years vacation, I bought the shoe in the tan. But this time, the shoe was very hard to get on even though it's the same size. And after wearing them for a few hours, my foot is a little sore across the top from the tightness. I debated returning them but the length was just right. I dont know if this pair was made tighter accidentally or what but I decided to keep them as I know they will slowly loosen up as the first pair has done.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brassette

customer_reviews.title: Very sporty
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking shoes!! I bought these for my husband. I ordered an 11 and the were much too large. I returned and ordered a 10.5 and they were a bit too small!! Ugh!! I asked him if he maybe wasn’t use to the material and elastic laces. He really likes them and is excited (as he can be) to wear them. Ha! I truly recommend these. I do suggest maybe ordering two pairs to get the sizing correct. They are attractive and sporty. Seem to be well made and very masculine.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: I WAS LOOKING FOR ANOTHER PAIR OF LIGHT AND COMFORTABLE SKETCHERS JUST TO KNOCK AROUND IN
customer_reviews.text: I WAS LOOKING FOR ANOTHER PAIR OF LIGHT AND COMFORTABLE SKETCHERS JUST TO KNOCK AROUND IN. WHEN THESE ARRIVED I WAS PLEASANTLY SURPRISED BY THE FIT, QUALITY AND APPEARANCE OF THESE SHOES. FIT MY 12W WITH A HIGH INSTEP JUST FINE.WHEN I FIRST REALIZED THAT THESE WERE THE "FAKE LACES" I WAS A LITTLE PUT OFF. HOWEVER, AFTER A FEW DAYS OF WEAR I DON'T MIND AT ALL. SLIP ON AND OFF EASILY AND CRADLE MY FEET VERY NICELY
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these Sketchers sneakers. Great arch support and springy soles, like walking on air. The mesh breathes so stay cool and no sweaty feet. Got these for work, they are classy enough to wear with casual slacks or go great with jeans. They are slip on shoes but the bungee laces give them a nice look. A little tight to get on but fit snug so no slipping of my heel. Got them in 2 colors, this and grey. Will most likely get another. GREAT CHOICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Bill C

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love how lightweight these are! Almost feels like you're not even wearing shoes. At first, I thought the foam soles would get damaged quickly but they've held up through everyday use for the past 3 months. Big fan of the laces and not having to untie/tie every time. Very easy to slip on and wipe clean. Neutral color goes with most things. Not as wide as Sketchers relaxed fit so make sure you actually order extra wide if you like the feel of those.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Cicero

customer_reviews.title: Put them to the paces today with 18,366 steps
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and fit great. I just walked 18,366 steps in London today and my feet, while a little tired, felt great overall. I got these for a two-day conference I'm attending this week and I'm sure these will be a good choice. Plus they look great with jeans as well as khakis and shorts, too.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Feels slightly smaller and tighter in the toe. Sole seems light weight.
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first purchase of the Skechers brand. I like that you don't have to tie them, but they seem smaller than a normal 11 shoe I wear and is tighter in the toe for me personally. My honest impression is that they don't seem to be built to last very long. I am speaking here in of the sole. They seem very lightweight and. The sole seems like it is made of very light weight material.
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: At first I ordered this in a wide width but the heel was way too wide. In my case the toe box was unstructured so it was wide enough even at a normal width. Having worn them for several days I dispute that they are super comfortable. In fact, I found them barely comfortable and not cushiony at all. I've worn them enough that I can't return them but I am very unimpressed with them.
customer_reviews.author: Saul Nathanson

customer_reviews.title: Great style with comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks, comfy like a tennis shoe, but with the looks closer to a casual shoe. Slips on easy. The one thing I don't like is the tread or lack of. If you try to walk on anything the least bit slick you will land on your keister. There are no serrations like a tennis shoe. For me it works, I'm not using it for a walking shoe. If you plan on doing daily walking then look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: billcb

customer_reviews.title: _Attractive well made shoe but they run one size too small
customer_reviews.text: Really great looking shoe well-made and light weight but is 100% a slip on pull on shoe. Lace ends are sewn together so no loosening or tightening at all. Also, size 12 felt like size 11 at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ermelin

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Several months ago i suffered a brain injury and could no longer tie my shoes. I had a pair of these and started wearing them more. So much more that I wanted another pair. These are very comfortable and I can put them on without using my hands. They look very good. I wear them with a suit to church so you could say they double as my Sunday shoes. I like these so much I will get a third pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rick the Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves these shoes! Purchased 11W and they fit as expected. He has wide feet and needs a wide in regular fit, but can get away with 11s in Skechers relaxed fit, although wide width is always preferred. We absolutely love that they are bungee laces (and not real laces) because he is very low maintenance and is all for anything functional. These shoes gives him a fashionable look without all the fuss, so we are both happy. Skechers, please keep making these!
customer_reviews.author: Kayakblue

customer_reviews.title: Runs way too large
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in size 8W because my other pair of Sketchers (different shoe) are size 8W and I purchased a few months ago, fit great. Received these and they are dramatically different in length, so much so that I had to return. Order a size smaller than you think would be my input.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yes! Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry no pics, however my fiancé absolutely LOVES these shoes. Every time we go out he wears them, they’re nice looking enough to wear to nicer places and not just foodlion/Walmart. They’re super comfy and he’s had them for about 2 months now, wears them every time we leave the house and he said they still feel like they did when he put them on! By far his fave shoes besides the crocs 🙄
customer_reviews.author: katelyn breeden

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe/Sneaker but.....
customer_reviews.text: color was listed as Black, but the shoe in question is the one on the left, the one on the right is Black/Tan or Black Brown - as described (same shoe different color). What is supposed to be Black / Black is really Charcoal / Black - not that it is bad, just not what was pictured or advertised. Would have preferred Black / Black. I have multiple pairs of these, as very comfortable and good for the office.
customer_reviews.author: Willy1

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is accurate !
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. They are a low cost casual slip on that looks good. I bought a 9 wide as I was influenced by other reviews. I have bought many pairs of Footjoy golf shoes that are 8.5 wide and they fit well. I should have bought these as 8.5 wide also. For me they did not fit as expected because I thought they were going to be snug so I bought a half size large but it turns out you don't need to buy a half size large. Their sizing is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stylish and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair, I like these a bit better with the dark heal. I bought the first pair for a two week trip to Europe with lots of walking and metro riding. I am 5'10" and 220 and need shoes that hold up to miles of urban walking without killing my feet. These did great, I was very impressed. Dont expect them to last too long though, but they work great and enough so that I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: SStrout

customer_reviews.title: Skechers quality, unusual looks and no tying of the laces
customer_reviews.text: I own probably 15 pairs of Skechers and love the quality, style and fit. The size 10.5 medium is my "go to" and I prefer the classic fit to relaxed fit as I do a fair amount of walking (6-7 miles / day). I bought this pair because of the simulated laces. I always opt for the slip-on because I can't be bothered with lacing up. This style give the wearer the look of laces without the associated headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: fit is fine, but not very stylish
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine, but this shoe quickly became my yard shoe for mowing grass, etc. I am 55, and this shoe reminds me of my age. If you want an easy shoe to put on, with good comfort and not have to tie laces, this shoe is good for that, but the styling looks like an old man's shoe to me, something I'd rather not have a daily reminder of at my age :((
customer_reviews.author: daviddsw

customer_reviews.title: Love the no laces
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these sneakers for about a week now but so far so good. They are comfortable to walk in even though they have not been "broken in" yet. The memory foam is great but my favorite part is the no laces. I was a bit worried about them staying on your feet but they do stay on and without being too tight. So pretty great so far & even thinking about getting another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy! Some may think sketchers are for kids/teens (my kids and myself kind of feel that way but I digress ). Sketchers has some hella comfortable sneakers, so I’ve purchased a couple sneaker styles for my husband (who works many strenuous hours on his feet) and he’s says In terms of comfort they compare evenly with some top of the line nikes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: New Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in good time and i tried them on right away. I always thought that new sneaks always felt good, but after a short time, they get to feel like your old ones did. I found these to be very comfortable and been wearing them every day. My feet feel so much better and glad that i made the purchase, because i am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: painful loafer style
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's a case of lofty expectations. Most of the time, I buy skechers because they are decent quality, medium durability, with a really comfortable foam footbed. I _thought_ these were part of the gowalk line, or at least would have a normal amount of support. instead, the first time I wore them, I got a wear blister from walking funny due to something stuck to the shoe. a rock? nope, a STICKER. the soles are so flat I could feel a sticker! 2/10 will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Galvatron

customer_reviews.title: Would buy in every color. So comfortable and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Found these shoes and ordered them for my husband. He had bought one pair and liked them so much we ordered more in a different color. These shoes look and feel very comfortable and look great with shorts and pants. They are light weight and casual but are smart too. My husband liked the slip on style which looks sleek without having any laces to tie.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed an additional pair of shoes for working when I'm not in boots these are cheap and I like that I don't have to lace them like the boots BUT not good for exercising i wore them for a few weeks while my runners were on order and man do they hurt your feet absolutely comfortable and convenient for everyday use just don't run in them.... im still wearing them as I write this
customer_reviews.author: dakota

customer_reviews.title: Skecher's Fit My Feet Like Gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always bought some of this brand for my kids when they were younger. I always wore only one brand at that time, and always paid four times as much. I finally bought a pair of Skecher's a few years ago, and I have bought five pairs since. They last well for me, They do not Cost a lot, and they are comfortable. Well made, and I only paid $25.00. I call that a bargain!!
customer_reviews.author: Rock Androl

customer_reviews.title: One week of wear
customer_reviews.text: The black on the bottom is peeling off after one week. I would not recommend these. As other reviews have stated the adhesive for the inside sole bleeds over to the edges and sticks to your socks. After about a week it seems to have lost most of its tackyness, but then the bottom of the shoe starts to peel off. Looks really bad. ONE WEEK OLD!
customer_reviews.author: jybrd

customer_reviews.title: Great value - great fit
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this is purely a slip on/off. I guess I was fooled by the laces. But after my initial surprise, I found they were easy to get on and off (not always so easy with this type of shoe), and they were very, very comfortable. Lightweight and easy to wear. Good cushioning while walking. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory S. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes better than the 5 or 6 similar pairs I've tried all of which seemed to slip up and down on my heel. They were a bit snug widthwise when I first tried them but have broken in a bit and are all around comfortable. They might even be just a small bit loose for me after wearing them for a bit. The laces are fixed which I'm not a fan of, I'd like to adjust the fit to be just a bit tighter. All in all pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Derek&Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes, but they do not tie
customer_reviews.text: I saw these in the Sketchers store and really liked them. However, they were more than I wanted to pay. When I saw these for $25 less, I had to jump on them. I thought they tied up, but they are slip on. I was concerned about my foot being too wide for a slip on, but after wearing them two days in a row, they seemed to loosen. Very nice styling.
customer_reviews.author: D.C. Landers

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support for me
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of these and hoped they would work out for me, I have bad plantar fasciitis. But... I had to return them. I have high arches and if they don't have arch support, I at least need some good plantar support. This was not good for either after wearing them for just a few hours. I was ultimately sad it did not work for me. :(
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe form design and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I’ve enjoyed wearing these shoes so much because they look great and fit perfectly. I’ve always struggled to find wide shoes that fit without being too wide or too long. These are perfect for me. You can really feel the air moving through them, which I also like, but they don’t keep your feet very warm in temperatures below freezing or when it’s raining (and they’re not supposed to).
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Love These Skechers!
customer_reviews.text: Skechers are my Go To brand the and I couldn’t be more satisfied with the Delson-Camden model (which I bought in taupe). My reasons for feeling this way are that: they are extremely comfortable, attractive, just the right width, length and arch support, and very reasonably priced on Amazon compared to a Skechers store.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbewig

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are some nice, comfy shoes for around the house. Don't know how they are for outdoors... probably atrocious in the rain because they're a stretchy fabric on the foot, but we'll see. The looks are quite stylish as well, I wish more brands had this style sense. For the price I got them for, $25, I'm totally happy.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Spotted these at kohl’s for $70.00 they didn’t have my size so I turned to Amazon. It’s so hard to buy shoes on line because sizes and brands run different. I just like these shoes, they look cool (I get a lot of compliments) their light weight and comfortable. Mine are a little big but that’s a fit issue I’m sure that wouldn’t have happened if I could have tried them on... their cool!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Stinky, Lots of Cushion
customer_reviews.text: Edit 2: I couldn't live with the smell. Nothing helped. I had to throw them away :( Again, I've never experienced anything like this with any other shoes; first time I've had the foot stink this bad. Edit 1: Was a 5 star, but after a few weeks, dear Lord do these things stink. I man, I'm a big dude, maybe even a stinky dude, but the odor from these shoes is horrendous! I've tried several deodorizer, nothing works! Original: I tried these on in a store then found them here for $20 cheaper, so I didn't have to guess about fitting correctly. These are super comfy and very cushiony (if you're into that sort of thing).
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: My Dad LOVES these.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Dad for his birthday. He has worn them every day since. Mom says he only takes them off to go to bed. We all think they're really nice looking. He can't get over how light they are. He's very picky about the way shoes fit, and he says these are perfect. Plenty of room for his toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No laces for these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that these shoes did not come with working laces. Naturally, I had to cut the fake laces out and put in actual laces so I had a pair of shoes I could wear. I was so surprised that shoes like this with no working laces could possibly be sold as real shoes. Now, I my shoes are authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Tate

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!!! Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a EEE width. These Skechers loafers were rated with a width of EE/EEE. They were a little snug when I first put them on but after stretching the ankle part of the opening with my hands, as well as the fixed string lacing, they became easier to slip on. After wearing them the next day, they loosened up and are now are very comfortable to wear. In fact, they fit perfect! ... Snug but comfortable. I will get this size again any time I buy a pair of Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: JDC

customer_reviews.title: My new permanent shoe(s)
customer_reviews.text: As in, I’ve purchased 2 more pairs to go with the original one I bought. Amazon should have a new category—verified triple purchase. I’m a lazy shoe man. I don’t like tying shoes. These slip on and yet are tight. Very rare in the shoe world. They are ultra comfortable and for $40 I’ve never found a higher quality pair for the price. Hence the triple purchase so I never have to be without this shoe again....
customer_reviews.author: Buddy boy

customer_reviews.title: A good wakling around shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable as you would expect from Skechers. Fit was as expected. As some have noted, the laces do not tie, they are elastic and basically stretch to fit your foot into the shoe. It is very convenient; however, this means you can't dial in the fit, so these are probably not good for running or strenuous hiking.
customer_reviews.author: TT in MA

customer_reviews.title: Comfy slip on shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly suprised by this shoe. Time will tell how it holds up. The laces are not adjustable so make sure to get the correct size. I like that I can throw them on in a hurry when I need to go outside. Comfartable, but I don't wear them for more than a few hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Great and mighty giggle meow

customer_reviews.title: Husband is over the moon for these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he absolutely loves them. He especially loves the cool air flow. He says they are very comfortable. I bought him another pair (different color) at my local store and he wears them to work daily. He says these are so much more comfortable than his nikes or under armors. It’s a win.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Stylish comfortable casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: 14W. I bought these as a casual shoe to wear with jeans. It’s nice that they are slip ons and the memory foam makes them comfy to wear. My wife likes the styling and the grey and black is a good combo with denim or black jeans. The fit is relaxed and roomy without being loose. Not sure how you can adjust the tightness if your foot is narrow as the laces are fixed elastic - so there’s some give but can’t tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like these. The fit is just okay, but they're super light and very comfy. I'm usually a standard size 10 mens, and these are just a little too long and narrow for my feet. My only only criticism is that they are difficult to slip on while standing, but at least they stay on- in fact, you don't really notice that you're wearing slip-ons. They feel pretty much like laced shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Benholio

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had my ankle replaced a few years ago so shoes seem to be a real hassle to get that fit correctly, support my arch, and are easy to get on. These do all that and more. They look decent as a casual loafer but they are sure easy to get on and off with my silly ankle issues.
customer_reviews.author: KNBishop

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable hubby love the new shoes
customer_reviews.text: These would have never interested my husband based on the photos on line. We went to the store and saw them in person and found Amazon had a better sale price. In person they look so much better than the photos on line. These can be dressed up with a nice pair of slacks or worn with shorts. They are very lightweight, he loves how these fit his feet. So very happy with these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: Sporty comfort is work appropriate.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple weeks now. This is a very comfortable walking shoe that I am able to spend all day at work in and not get hot foot. I had to order a 1⁄2 size smaller than my typical shoe. The styling is not too casual to wear to the office. I have found the Velcro laces nice and snug while wearing but yet easy to get on and off. I will definitely consider other Skechers after wearing this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He has trouble with his arches and needs good support. He absolutely loves these shoes! He’s on concrete floors a good bit of the day....no issues after standing a lot. Buying again! The 8.5 size is true to size. Color, grey/black, wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Dotzkidz

customer_reviews.title: Big difference between regular and wide
customer_reviews.text: I saw these online and liked the looks of them. I am now at an age were comfort is slightly more important than fashion, but I still like to have nice looking shoes. I found the regular width in a store and tried them on. Liked the look, but they were a bit snug, so i figured i would order the wide. When they arrived, the box described them as extra wide and they look entirely different than the regular width...almost Herman Munster like. However, they are extremely comfortable, so I kept them because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: When People Ask Where Did you Get Your Shoes....
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes, so many compliments on the color (taupe, which is the clay color with medium blue steel bungee laces). Men actually ask the brand and where did they get them! They are truly cushioned and comfortable. I believe besides the style, comfort, his biggest pro is the slip on, bungee laces, no more tying or tripping over laces. He normally wears 11 size 11 right, but went wide instead of medium, for the size. Fits great!
customer_reviews.author: DealShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good dang shoe!
customer_reviews.text: First time ordering shoes from Amazon. These shoes are very nice. Easy slip on and off, loose fitting around my foot instead of being super tight like typical shoes. Feet feel much better in these than my previous shoes. So far, a month in, they are holding up great. Not very warm for winter weather, but they are shoes, not boots. I would recommend these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: TinyTurnips

customer_reviews.title: Love Sketchers for wide width!
customer_reviews.text: My son, 26 spent years in uncomfortable shoes, even tennis shoes. One day it dawned on us all to get wide and his life has been happier since. Sketchers are our go-to name for his shoes. I'm not sure why all brands don't take care of their customers this way. I am/we are and will always be a sketchers backer!
customer_reviews.author: Krisminn.

customer_reviews.title: Nice after awkward break in period
customer_reviews.text: These shoes take some breaking in. I think they're true to size for me. The only thing that was initially weird is the heel support which made each step feel awkward. I almost returned them but now they've broken in and I have no issues with them. They are my go to slip ons now.
customer_reviews.author: slimz

customer_reviews.title: Order a size smaller than normal!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 in almost all other shoe brands but when I received these in 10.5 they were to big. I suggest you order a size smaller than normal. The sole wears a bit faster than I was expecting, granted I use them as my work shoes and usually walk 2-6 miles per day during my shift. Could just be my overall use of them being the reason. All in all they're comfortable shoes and decent for the price they have.
customer_reviews.author: Keigan

customer_reviews.title: Once you wear them in a bit they're great
customer_reviews.text: At first the laces were so tight that the circulation was being cut off to my feet. But after a week or so of wearing them they loosened up and now they're awesome. Most times shoes like these the backs will start to fail because you need to shove your foot in violently. But on these the back is made of this neoprene material that allows it to move out of the way. I recommend these shoes for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle L.

customer_reviews.title: These run small and pronate your ankles/shins inward
customer_reviews.text: Decent enough looking shoe, but run a bit small and they way the structure of the shoe is spread out, when you put weight on one foot, your loaded ankle pronates your ankle toward your center of mass, causing you to look like your knock-kneed. I believe that this is unique to this shoes design/engineering as I have worn addidas, reebok, nike, brooks, etc and this has never happened before. As if they needed more material on the inside of the soles or better structure on the inside/sidewall of the shoe. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Z

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, Comfort, Comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our son recommended these to us, so we thought we'd give them a try. My husband LOVES these shoes! We ended up ordering another color also, and will probably keep ordering different colors as they become available! They are very comfortable and have plenty of width in the toe area which is hard to find in a nice stylish shoe. The slip-on feature is fantastic! I would recommend these highly!
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: My husband’s fave shoes right now
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband’s 2nd pair. When I got him the first pair he didn’t think it was a big deal but after trying out he always told me that the memory foam make it feels like he is walking on a cloud. The grey color pair is even better looking than his first pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Annie C.

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the comfort and price on these skechers.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a size 13W. Shoes are difficult to find in his size. This is his third pair and he's loves them. They have an air cooled memory gel cushion which helps fo r someone who is on their feet must of their day. The color is grey and grey/ black breathable fabric. Actually found the skechers cheaper and in a size 13w. Will be ordering another pair while I can still find them.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Delson-Camben Trainers
product_meta.description: Instant sporty style and lightweight comfort delivers in the Skechers Delson - Camben shoe. Lightweight knit mesh fabric and synthetic upper in a slip on laced-front sporty casual comfort sneaker oxford with stitching and overlay accents. Air cooled memory foam insole, flexible comfort midsole.
feature_bullets: Almost one-piece flat knit mesh upper
Sporty walking sneaker with bungee lacing for slip-on
Side overlays made of smooth synthetic material for increased durability
Woven sporty pattern with varying stripes on the side
